Player History

Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 2/13/1970 (Going to CIN: 2B C. Ruiz. Going to STL: RF J. Fuller)...

Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 3/2/1971 (Going to CHC: C C. Taylor. Going to STL: RF D. Ford)...
